meanings.definition: The art or process of working with plaster to create decorative or protective finishes on walls or ceilings.
meanings.sent1: The plasterwork in the old castle was intricate and beautiful.
meanings.sent2: The plasterwork in our house is starting to crack and peel.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat left paw prints in the wet plasterwork on the wall.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like delicate plasterwork, carefully crafted to hide the truth.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight streaming through the window illuminated the plasterwork, casting shadows on the floor.

meanings.definition: Plaster used as a decorative or protective finish on walls or ceilings.
meanings.sent1: We need to repair the damaged plasterwork in the living room.
meanings.sent2: The plasterwork in the historic building has stood the test of time.
meanings.sent3: The children pretended the plasterwork was a secret code written on the walls.
meanings.sent4: The moonlight shone on the plasterwork, giving it an ethereal glow.
meanings.sent5: The intricate plasterwork added a touch of elegance to the room.
